channel.title: Comments on: 20 Best Practices For Designing Better UIs

item.title: By: Thomas Jahnson
item.dc:creator: Thomas Jahnson
item.description: Hi, this is cool but i know something cooler than this, sleeping!
item.content:encoded: Hi, this is cool but i know something cooler than this, sleeping!

item.title: By: Max Ruiney
item.dc:creator: Max Ruiney
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://www.anshad.ga/2016/06/19/20-best-practices-for-designing-better-uis/#comment-11">Micheal Fabise</a>.
Hey guys, thanks for the useful information.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Micheal Fabise.

Hey guys, thanks for the useful information.

item.title: By: Micheal Fabise
item.dc:creator: Micheal Fabise
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://www.anshad.ga/2016/06/19/20-best-practices-for-designing-better-uis/#comment-10">Carol Heisenberg</a>.
Thanks Carol, glad you liked it. Nice to see you around.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Carol Heisenberg.

Thanks Carol, glad you liked it. Nice to see you around.

item.title: By: Carol Heisenberg
item.dc:creator: Carol Heisenberg
item.description: Hi, this is a very useful article. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
item.content:encoded: Hi, this is a very useful article. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
